messages.title: I want to hear from you
messages.content: Invitation to get involved in Gordon's local campaign.

messages.title: A future fair for all
messages.content: Expressing Gordon's commitment to responsibility to local people and work ethic.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support local jobs and business; making the most of new opportunities in renewable technology and improving the green economy.
Helping hundreds of families as a local MP, taking up cases and campaigns on their behalf with local and national agencies.
Celebrating Fife's past, including presenting hundreds of local veterans with their Armed Forces badges.

mentions.candidate: Gordon Brown is motivated day in, day out by standing up for families and communities in Fife.

issues.economy: Global economic crisis has presented huge challenges for banks and companies and for all of our citizens.
issues.socialWelfare: Making our communities safer; taking action against domestic crime, which particularly harms the young, the elderly, and the vulnerable.

leaflet.personalStatement: 'I have represented local people, families and communities here in Fife for more than 25 years. Standing up for local people is why I'm asking for your vote.'

politicalExperience.achievements: Welcoming former UN Secretary General Kofi Annan to Fife in 2009.

images.caption: Gordon as Chancellor at Adam Smith College, welcoming former UN Secretary General Kofi Annan to Fife in 2009.
Gordon with his team supporting local businesses, colleges, and schools.
Gordon ensuring that the local economy is well prepared to meet tomorrow's challenges.
Gordon taking up cases and campaigns on behalf of local families.
Gordon commemorating and celebrating Fife's past, presenting hundreds of local veterans with their Armed Forces badges.
